title: @ZenonTheStoic what happen with the WW rework?
body:
Today we celebrate an exactly one year of the "new kit" of Warwick has  posted by ZenonTheStoic, IMO a ver nice kit with more interactive playstyle, much better than the actual, finally some way to gank in pre-6, counter gaming for his cancerous ult, not more coward wolf (With this I want to refer when ww figth againts you put your life under 50% and run away thanks to the huge mov spd buff), a really need shield that reduce the damage when ww are auto-supressed, also a very important fact its: a more clearly identity "Draining tank". And the fantaastic oprtunuty to make "cool" plays with the boomerang move (His new tenative active E). 

All this time I wait for news about this rewok, specially when WW received the quadra nerf on the 4.21 "Destroy the Wolf" patch, probably one of the most recently **HARD OVERNERF** champs, I mean:


1
>W - Hunter's Call
DURATION 10 seconds ⇒ 6 seconds

2
>R - Infinite Duress
TOTAL BASE DAMAGE 250/335/420 magic damage ⇒ 150/250/350 magic damage 
Cooldown increased to 110 / 90 / 70 seconds from 90 / 80 / 70.

3
>Skirmisher's Sabre
STOP IT WARWICK : Basic attacks against a Challenged target deal 17-51 (based on level) true damage on hit ⇒ 60-162 (based on level) true damage over 3 seconds

4
>Enchantment - Devourer
MAGIC DAMAGE ON HIT 40 ⇒ 25

All this in the same patch, why so much hate for only one champ, I know he deserve some nerf but not all these at the same time...

So after that HUUUUGEE OVERNERF, I really think that the Warwick rework is ready to show up, I mean after that why I want to use a practically useless champ but has been past 4 months and we don't have news about Warwick rework because the actual state its very poorly.

And yes its "practically useless"  a completly overnerf champ that have a main role in the jungle but sadly he can't gank before he reach the lvl 6, I know sounds ironic but its true, but thats its not enough the list its more large: 

* don't have any AoE damage in his kit 

* his W AoE buff have lot of hidden power that its completly nocive for the game (40% of the time nerfed in the 4.21 destroy the wolf patch)

* his mana values are too high in comparision with his poorly mana pool (750 of max mana and 110 mana cost by one simple Q holyyy sh.... saadly its true)

* his ult don't have any counter-play if he see you and you are in his range, he "magycally" appear on you and destroy you without any chance of respond if you are alone, the problem its not being destroying by him, the problem its how the hell I can avoid him?

* his ult its a double-edge sword bad design move, if you catch someone else alone: worth, if he its with any other and have a hard cc: bye ww.

* his E its a very situational ability that only active its someone near are weak, so yep sometimes can stay "off" by a loooong time.

* he can't gank before he reach the lvl 6 (that its so ironic... yeah I know that I say this before but pls he is THE jungler)

* Its a Hunter but most of the times he run away cowardly, I really hate that WW uses his massive movement speed to run away, He is suppposed to be the hunter not the prey

And the best that he can do (duel and shreding tanks) received a very massive nerf on the 4.21 "Destroy the Wolf patch" and sadly another items affected by this... Poorly Devourer enhanced :(

Actually he really need to past a huge amount of time stacking devourer to stay revelant in the game, his actual kit have numerous problems and put Warwick on that "bad spot" champs. So now its a very good chance to put the Warwick rework on, he really need to stay in a healthy side, and the ZenonTheStoic rework kit its a good solution for this because much of the core problems have been solved and more important received a very good "playmaking" move like the "Boomerang Wolf". so please ZenonTheStoic put this rework alive again and give us the new Warwick because the actual is a joke, a vagabound wolf dyng slowy in the misery...

PD: The link of the ZenonTheStoic rework kit (IMO a great work for Daniel kLein): http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/232dan/warwick_rework_teaser_e_boomerang_move_block_from/cgsv64r

Just to address your points as I don't want to seem as though I'm completely ignoring your suggestion

1. Not every character or team composition needs to play out exactly the same. Warwick is really unable to gank at 6, but this comes with the benefit of being one of very few champs that can solo a dragon at 3 minutes. And despite what most people may believe this is a huge advantage late game (when you can have 5 stacks at 28 minutes and baron.) If you are playing Warwick at high plat (as you say you do) your team should be well aware of warwicks limitations and realize they need to be extra careful while you get 6. And if in fact they are able to do this your team will end up far ahead of the "early jungle ganker" team because he spent time sitting in brush and attempting to get a gank in.


2. Warwicks "W", his Howl - This lasts just long enough to assist in clearing the large monster in most camps, and late game a Warwick doesn't need to rely on this as much since most WW build Tanky/Aspd/OnHit. For instance, my build at level 36 minutes has 2.3 attack speed -BASE-. W will easily cap it out at 2.5 - Where does it come into use? Team fighting! It gives your team an attack speed boost and will enable you to gobble up assists. Warwick is an auto-attack Sustain/tank champion. This ability fits in his kit. 

3. Warwicks E - Blood scent is fine the way it is. Vayne has to move towards champions because vayne is ranged. Warwick is not. Same logic for the other champions that have that "Move toward opponent only" effect. Blood scent is intended to be used as both an engage and an escape because frankly thats all warwick has. Warwick cant tumble. Warwick cant fire from ranged - and it too fits with his kit. Also, toggling blood scent and timing for ganks is a skill that sadly most warwicks dont have (I facepalm every time i see a warwick that LEAVES THIS ON!).

4. Warwicks R - Infinite duress has two hard counters. First: any kind of stun or knockup will free an opponent of infinite duress. Second: QSS or Zhonya's will practically invalidate warwick's ultimate. Turning it into a skillshot would be nothing more than a nerf to an already underwhelming ultimate that has seen nerfs recently. Right now its useful, not overpowered but certainly not garbage (as turning it into a skillshot would do). Secondly your change would literally turn Warwick into Sion. We don't need another Sion.

5. Warwicks mana/mana pool - I'm not sure why you have issues with mana on warwick. I honestly rarely ever have this problem, and it's certainly never precluded me from being able to do what i need to do in a teamfight. If you're able to expend all of your mana in a fight as warwick there's a good chance you've probably won that fight.


Lastly - The reasoning for you wanting this rework as stated in your OP is that he was nerfed severely, yet most of your suggestions are in fact nerfs.

His W nerf let WW in a very bad state only gaining 1.63 during the total of the 6 seconds...

Warwick's base attack speed is .679 attacks per second

With no W: 6 seconds x .679 attacks/second = 4.07 attacks

With W activated (+40% attack speed): 6 seconds x 1.4 x .679 attacks/second = 5.70 attacks

difference = 5.70 - 4.07= 1.63 auto-attacks gained if the target stands still (and Warwick isn't stunned or AS slowed) for the full 6 seconds.

Sadly, while it may seem that attack speed items would improve W, they do not-- attack speed % buffs are additive, and W is an attack speed % buff, not a change in Warwick's base attack speed. Here's an example:

With no W but 40% in attack speed buffs from runes/items/levels: 6 x 1.4 x .679 = 5.70

With W activated and the 40% attack speed buffs (total 80%): 6 x 1.8 x .679 = 7.33

Difference = 7.33 - 5.70 = 1.63 attacks gained

Riot, now that Warwick has been nerfed into obscurity, could you consider giving him something back, his rework its veru urgent...
